name: No Spray, No Pay
description:
You've landed yourself a new job working on a local farm where you'll be watering plants; how hard can it be?

  • Use WASD to move, the mouse to aim and the left mouse button to fire your hose
  • Keep all of the plants hydrated to stop them from dying out; if too many die, you’ll be fired from your job!
  • If you run out of water, go and get a top up from a tap

Made as part of Ludum Dare 46: "Keep It Alive"
